name: Eye of Newt Redux
description:
You are the Newt's third eye, a most prized newtritious ingredient. Make your way through the candy realm and back to the witch that summoned you.

Controls:

WASD for movement
SPACE to jump
Mouse to move camera

Controller compatible

-Demo Only

If you liked this, check out the original Eye of Newt made in only 48 hours for the New Mexico Game Jam:
https://jharger.itch.io/eye-of-newt
